text:
Lucas: Claus! I knew you were in there somewhere! I missed you so much.
Hey it's alright. Come on, let's go home.
W-what are you doing?
Wait Claus, don't do it!
You'll die!
Please don't do it! I can't lose you too!
Claus!
Claus fired an intense bolt of lightning!
Lucas's Franklin Badge reflected the lightning back!
Lucas: CLAUS!














Claus took mortal damage!

author: Exan

text:
Poor Porky. 
All he wanted was prove that he was strong enough in the only way he knew how. To be more than just the fat, obnoxious, cowardly kid and be a hero. He takes ultimate power from evil itself, hoping it will make him strong, but he was just a kid who never learned responsibility and gets trapped on an island when he loses his powers, full of hate for losing his chance to go back and prove his worth. He has a fit and winds up an angry, wrinkled, confused child, alone for all eternity.

text: I remember when I was impatiently waiting for the game's release, I'd go check out Itoi's website for new info almost everyday, he had those little presents that would open up every now and then, revealing new stuff about the mysterious game. One of them was the reveal of the main theme played on piano, which is this version. I've been a fan of it ever since.
